title: 4-Bit Digital Decoder
description:
IS_NCC tests whether the string STR none of the in STR listed characters
are included. Is a character of CMP found in STR, the function returns FALï¿¾SE.
name: DEC_4

input.name: D
input.description: Data input that controls the activation of the outputs.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output signal 0, active when D is TRUE, A0 is FALSE, and A1 is FALSE.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output signal 1, active when D is TRUE, A0 is TRUE, and A1 is FALSE.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output signal 2, active when D is TRUE, A0 is FALSE, and A1 is TRUE.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output signal 3, active when D is TRUE, A0 is TRUE, and A1 is TRUE.
